title: Amnesty Deception Unveiled
outcome: The Council's promise of restoring erased citizens is revealed as a ruse. Instead of full restoration, a 'shadow compliance' layer tracks the previously vanished more harshly, causing panic, renewed protests, and the birth of an underground resistance. Faction tensions peak as leaked records show deep Council and Directorate complicity.

events.description: Council quietly implements 'shadow compliance' for recently restored citizens, monitoring their actions with stricter scoring and secret restrictions.
Rada collaborates with affected citizens to document and share patterns of ongoing discrimination, prompting anger in former protest zones.
Oksana leaks internal memos revealing Directorate plans to use 'restored' citizens as test subjects for harsher BCI measures. Panic spreads among those at risk.
Mass marches erupt as citizens realize the true nature of the Council's restoration. Public squares fill with protests and new calls for BCI abolition.
Underground organizers form secret communication networks for erased citizens, laying groundwork for ongoing resistance beyond the BCI's control.
